author: Keith Rozario
content:
Thanks cheehoong,

Yeah, you're right there still are at least 5-10 different daily deal sites. But only one was bought by Groupoun, that was Groupsmore. I'm not sure why Groupoun chose Groupsmore over the rest, and you're right this is very similar to that.

If you're interested in starting a daily deals site, check this out:
http://www.keithrozario.com/2011/09/starting-your-own-groupon-site.htmlÂ
